title: Update Client Admin password validation (special characters + case sensitivity)

requirements.summary: Replace the hardcoded Client Admin password with the new strong password string.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/hooks/useClientAdminAuth.ts, the hardcoded admin password is replaced with exactly "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r".
Entering "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r" in the Client Admin login successfully unlocks and displays the admin panel/dashboard UI.
Entering any other password does not unlock the admin panel/dashboard UI and shows the existing error message.

file_operations.description: Update the CORRECT_PASSWORD constant to exactly "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r" and ensure the login comparison continues to use an exact match.

requirements.summary: Ensure the Client Admin password input accepts special characters and passes the raw value unchanged to authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: The password input field in frontend/src/pages/ClientAdminPage.tsx allows typing and pasting special characters (@, #, &, *, :) without validation errors or character stripping.
The value passed into useClientAdminAuth.login() matches exactly what the user typed (no trimming, sanitizing, or normalization that would remove/alter these characters).

file_operations.description: Ensure the password field remains a plain controlled input (no pattern/minLength validation, no trimming/sanitization in onChange or submit). Confirm handleSubmit passes the password state directly into onLogin(password) unchanged.

requirements.summary: Keep Client Admin password authentication strictly case-sensitive with exact string matching.
acceptanceCriteria: "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r" unlocks the admin panel/dashboard, while any variant with different letter casing does not unlock it.
Authentication uses an exact string match (no case folding, no locale-based normalization).

file_operations.description: Verify and preserve strict case-sensitive exact string comparison for the password check (no lowercasing/uppercasing/normalization); keep password equality as a direct string match.
